entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
